AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Automatic
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Automatically choose between item names getting displayed with their count when hidden and count only when having visible contents, either directly or through the building only accepting one kind

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Total count
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display the total count of all items in storage in a format [ COUNT ]

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Item names with count
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display item names and their count in a format of Item xY, one entry per line

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Item names with count or total count
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display up to 3 item names and their count in a format of Item xY, one entry per line, or the total count when having more items

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Item names
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display names of stored items, one entry per line

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Item names or total count
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display up to 3 names of stored items, one entry per line, or the total count when having more items

AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.label: Vanilla
AdaptiveStorage.ContentLabelStyleDef.description: Display item counts individually on each item
